评论详情: I love this workout top. It is long and comfortable. I bought it to wear to the gym. I will definitely buy it in another color. I wish there were more colors available.
Happy with this purchase! Lightweight but nice and warm!

评论详情: This is a slim fitting tunic and I ordered 2 sizes larger than recommended. I like the length and it is thin enough to not be too hot.

This shirt is very comfortable and fits me well. I bought a medium and love it. I do have long legs, but it is long enough to cover my buttocks with leggings & not too long where it looks like I'm wearing a dress. Love the long length of the sleeves w/ the thumb slits as well. Definitely would recommend!

Love this shirt!!! Accurate description fits perfect and I love the feeling against my skin!!!! Only thing is it don't have pockets BUT it's a workout shirt so shouldn't have pockets so I won't ding them for it!! I love it!
Another purchase for my daughter shortly after delivering twins. The large is REALLY large.
Great material, pretty close to true to size, but maybe a bit small. My only complaint is that the sleeves are too short for the thumb holes to fit the way they should.

Very cozy but breathable. Thumb holes are my favorite feature as well as it does not hug you mid section, if you’re feeling a lil’ pudgy :)

I was very pleasantly surprised by the fit and style of this hooded tunic! It checked all of the boxes for me: I'm tall, so it had to be long enough for me to wear with leggings/check! I wanted thumbholes with sleeves long enough for it to be comfortable/check! I wanted a lighter material that would be easy to layer when necessary/check! I preferred a top that wouldn't cling to my pudgy spots/check!  At the very least, give it a try. I bought two and sent the link to each of my sisters.
Great size and very thin so will fit in carry-on
